entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
